stances.name: Axebreaker
stances.desc: You make use of the nimbleness of a blade to thwart slower weapons with ease.
stances.accumulate: Gain 2 _Momentum_ at Refresh if you are Wielding a _Blade_ Weapon.
stances.effect: Reduce the Attack Roll of all Attacks with _Blunt_ Weapons that target you by 1 as long as you are Wielding a _Blade_ Weapon.
stances.special: You may use the Counter Reaction for no Cost when attacked with a _Blunt_ Weapon as long as you are Wielding a _Blade_ Weapon.

stances.name: Bloodletter
stances.desc: You fight a war of attrition, focusing more on inflicting wounds that dealing damage.
stances.accumulate: Gain _Momentum_ equal to a Target's topmost _Bleed_ Token when you Hit or Crit with an Attack using a Blade.
stances.effect: Whenever you Hit or Crit with an Attack using a Blade Weapon, increase the Target's top Bleed Token by 1. If the _Bleed_ Token is already 3, inflict _Wound_ 1 (1 _Grit_) instead.

stances.name: Guarded
stances.desc: You keep your blade on the defensive, darting in and out whenever .
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ at Refresh if you are Wielding a _Blade_ Weapon.
stances.effect: Whenever you use a _Block_ or _Evade_ Reaction you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to deal Damage to the triggering Creature as if you rolled a 5 with your Blade Weapon, so long as they are within your Weapon's Range.

techniques.name: Warding Strike
techniques.desc: A strike that deals less damage, but easily allows you to slip into a defensive stance.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Reduce the Damage by 2. Gain 1 _Grit_ or _Reflex_.
techniques.imbue: 0 _Momentum_: If the Weapon is _Light_ or _Versatile_, Speed is instead Weapon-1 and Move is Step. _Versatile_ Weapons take a -2 damage penalty.

techniques.name: Lacerating Strike
techniques.desc: You go for a quick strike that leaves a vicious wound that, while not immediately lethal, will bleed heavily.
techniques.reqs: Light or Versatile Blade Weapon Wielded.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Reduce the Damage by X, with a max of 3. Inflict _Bleed_ 1xX (X _Grit_ negates).
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Increase the Cost to Negate by 1, and inflict _Wounded_ 1 as well.

techniques.name: Flurry of Steel
techniques.desc: You unleash a rapid series of sword attacks in the blink of an eye.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile three times against the same Target.

techniques.name: Passing Blade
techniques.desc: You quickly strike with your blade while passing by a foe.
techniques.effect: Use one of the Moves provided by this Technique. Attack using your Weapon's Profile. Use the other Move.
techniques.special: If you Hit or Crit, add _Safe_ to the second Move.

techniques.name: Vorpal Strike
techniques.desc: You go for a vicious strike that is almost certainly lethal for unarmored foes.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Treat the Target's Armor as twice its current value for this attack. If the Target has no Armor or you target a Creature Part, deal 4 additional Damage.

techniques.name: Blade Lock
techniques.desc: You lock your blade with an enemy, forcing them to give you their full attention.
techniques.effect: Unless the Target pays any 2 of _Reflex_ or _Focus_ you enter a Blade Lock with them. Choose one of the creature's Wielded Weapons to enter a Blade Lock with, as well as a Blade Weapon you have Wielded. The first creature to either use the Weapon involved in the Blade Lock or willingly Move out of Melee Range loses the Blade Lock. The victor may immediately make a Basic Strike against them at Advantage as a Reaction. On a Hit or Crit, inflict _Impair_ 1 (1 _Grit_).
techniques.special: If the creature is unwillingly moved, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to make a Basic Strike as a Reaction.

techniques.name: Sunder
techniques.desc: You lash out at a foe's weapon, attempting to render it useless.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile, targeting a Wielded Weapon.

techniques.name: Blinding Flourish
techniques.desc: You draw blood and, with an elegant flourish, use it to blind a foe.
techniques.reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while only Wielding a Blade Weapon.
techniques.effect: If you inflict _Bleed_ with the Attached Strike you may inflict _Blind_ on a creature within Range until the end of their next turn. The Cost to Negate is (X _Reflex_), where X is equal to the total value of _Bleed_ inflicted.

techniques.name: Slashing Counter
techniques.desc: You meet a foes' blade in a dangerous counter, putting both weapons are risk.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked with a Weapon.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile, targeting the Weapon used for the Attack. If the Target's weapon is _Damaged_, reduce their initial Attack Roll against you by 2. If you Miss, also resolve the Target's Attack against your Weapon. Otherwise, reduce the Attack Roll by 1.

stances.name: Swordbreaker
stances.desc: You make use of the range of your lance to easily keep blades away.
stances.accumulate: Gain 2 _Momentum_ at Refresh if you are Wielding a _Lance_ Weapon.
stances.effect: Reduce the Attack Roll of all Attacks with _Blade_ Weapons that target you by 1 as long as you are Wielding a _Lance_ Weapon.
stances.special: You may use the Counter Reaction for no Cost when attacked with a _Blade_ Weapon as long as you are Wielding a _Lance_ Weapon.

techniques.name: Pointed Retreat
techniques.desc: You lash out with your weapon before safely moving backwards.
techniques.effect: Attack with your Weapon's Profile.
techniques.special: If all Movement is taken after you Attack, add the _Safe_ keyword.

techniques.name: Lower Spear
techniques.desc: You ready your weapon for an incoming charge, preparing to punish a foe's momentum.
techniques.effect: Make all spaces in a Side Burst X a Hazard, where X is your Lance Weapon's Reach. All Reactions using your Lance Weapon against a creature in these spaces cost 1 less and deal additional damage equal to half the number of spaces that creature moved this turn. All Reactions using your Lance Weapon cost 1 more against creatures not in these Hazard spaces. These Hazards are removed if you move or are no longer Wielding your Lance.

name: Lasher
flavor: You are a maser of whips and chains, causing them to strike as suddenly and unpredictably as a snake.

name: Martial Artist
flavor: Your body itself is the weapon, preventing you from ever being disarmed.

name: Sharpshooter
flavor: You reign down damage from afar, making use of a powerful long-ranged weapon with ease.

name: Thrower
flavor: You fling weapons with uncanny, practiced skill, easily finding purchase against a foe.

stances.name: Bully
stances.desc: Your weapons carry more weight than most, something you can use to great effect.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you _Push_ a foe with your Weapon, gain 1 _Momentum_. Whenever you knock a foe _Prone_ with your Weapon, gain 2 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Whenever you Hit with a Weapon Strike using a Blunt Weapon you may add _Push_ 1. Whenever you Crit, you may add either _Push_ 2 or knock them _Prone_.
stances.special: Whenever you _Push_ a creature into an Obstacle with a Blunt Weapon they take 2 True Damage.

stances.name: Crusher
stances.desc: You specialize in punishing foes in armor, not only shattering their defenses but also crumpling it in a painful way.
stances.effect: Whenever you _Shred_ with a Blunt Weapon also inflict _Wounded_ 1 (1 _Grit_).
stances.special: When you reduce a creature's Armor to 0 you may inflict _Hobbled_ 3 (2 _Grit_).

stances.name: Lancebreaker
stances.desc: Your blunt weapon is well-suited for breaking through the feeble defenses of a spear.
stances.accumulate: Gain 2 _Momentum_ at Refresh if you are Wielding a _Blunt_ Weapon.
stances.effect: Reduce the Attack Roll of all Attacks with _Lance_ Weapons that target you by 1 as long as you are Wielding a _Blunt_ Weapon.
stances.special: You may use the Counter Reaction for no Cost when attacked with a _Lance_ Weapon as long as you are Wielding a _Blunt_ Weapon.

techniques.name: Backbreaker
techniques.desc: You slam your weapon into a prone foe, transferring all the force into their body.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. If the Target is _Prone_ you may treat a roll of 8 or higher as a 12, add _Hobbled_ 2 to the Attack, and increase the Cost to Negate by 1.

techniques.name: Sapping Strike
techniques.desc: Your weapon makes heavy contact, slowly draining your foe's will to fight.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. On a Hit, you may force the Target to discard 1 Defensive Token. On a Crit, they discard 2. If they do not have sufficient Defensive Tokens, deal additional damage equal to the number of tokens they do not discard.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: If you Hit or Crit, inflict _Wounded_ 1 (2 _Grit_) after the Target discards Tokens.

techniques.name: Concussive Strike
techniques.desc: A strike putting the full weight of your weapon to bear, leaving a foe unable to respond.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Increase the Cost to Negate by 1, and inflict _Dazed_ 2 (2 _Focus_) on an 8+.

techniques.name: Clear a Path
techniques.desc: You march across the battlefield, clearing a path with your hammer.
techniques.effect: All Movement granted by this ability must be in a straight line. Every time you move a space, you may use a Basic Strike against a creature directly in front of you, adding _Push_ 1 (2 _Grit_). If the Strike would _Push_, instead _Push_ that creature to your left or right instead of directly away from you. If you are unable to keep moving because a creature was not Pushed, end this attack.

techniques.name: Helm Splitter
techniques.desc: A mighty overhand blow that thwarts armor and attempts to block.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile and increase the Damage by 2.

techniques.name: Destructive Backswing
techniques.desc: You don't waste your weapon's momentum and instead use it to press your advantage.
techniques.trigger: You _Miss_ or _Graze_ with an Attack using a Blunt Weapon.
techniques.effect: Choose one: Move 1, repeat the Attack against an Obstacle in Range, or inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) on the original Target of the Attack.

techniques.name: Mighty Swing
techniques.desc: You smash through the terrain with your weapon, creating an opening for yourself.
techniques.effect: Attack an Obstacle using your weapon's Profile. If you destroy it, deal 2 Damage and inflict _Vulnerable_ 2 (1 _Reflex_) on a creature adjacent to the Obstacle. You may also Move 1 into the Obstacle's space, separate from your current Movement.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, inflict _Exposed_ 2 and increase the cost to Negate by 1.
techniques.imbue: 1 _Momentum_: Speed is instead Set-Up and the Cost to Negate is increased by 1.

techniques.name: Bash Aside
techniques.desc: You focus an attack on a foe's defenses, doing little damage but knocking them off-balance.
techniques.effect:
You may purchase a number of the following effects equal to the Speed of your Weapon and inflict them on a creature within Range. You may purchase the same effect multiple times:
	• 1: Inflict _Exposed_ 1 or _Vulnerable_ 2.
	• 2: Inflict _Staggered_, _Exposed_ 2 _Vulnerable_ 3, or _Dazed_ 1.
	• 3: Inflict _Exposed_ 3 or _Dazed_ 2.
	• 4: Inflict _Dazed_ 3.
The total Cost to Negate is Grit or Focus equal to your Weapon's Speed.

techniques.name: Shattering Flourish
techniques.desc: You tear your weapon away with brutal force, destroying armor and creating an opening.
techniques.reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while only Wielding a Blunt Weapon.
techniques.effect: Immediately make a Basic Strike against the creature's Armor using the same Weapon used for the Attached Strike. Deal no Damage to the Creature and inflict no Conditions.
techniques.special: If the Target of the Attached Strike used a _Block_ Reaction against the Attached Strike, you may instead choose Target a piece of Equipment they have Wielded. This attack does not have Disadvantage.
